website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for puppies who you want to train to be agility all-stars one day.
pros: Younger dogs will love playing with this tunnel that comes equipped with a steel frame
It's easy to store because it's collapsible and can be used indoors or outside thanks to its polyester material
Coming with three holes, they can be stitched together to create a fun maze
cons: Comes with toys designed to keep cats' interest, so may not be ideal for hardcore agility training

customer_reviews.title: Needs a bigger opening, but good for my kitten.
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is very thin so kitty's claws shred right through it. Make sure you trim their nails frequently if you want this to last! The opening is also fairly small for a 10lb average size cat, but my 6lb kitten loves it and fits perfectly. Description dimensions are not entirely accurate - The openings have a lip of fabric that reduces the crawl space. Photos attached.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Great play tunnel for cats
customer_reviews.text: I have a petite cat and a medium build 13lb point cat that both love this tunnel. Some people said it’s too small but I found that my larger cat loves to play in it just because of that— he likes to crouch and lie on his back paws up in the tunnel. The plastic fabric is sturdy as well. The cats have been clawing at the walls when they play and there hasn’t been a tear. Peek a boo hole adds another fun element they use often and makes for some fun moments.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Entertainment, for humans and bunnies!
customer_reviews.text: Our bunnies really enjoy this tunnel and we love watching them play in it. It is very lightweight and fairly easy to fold up for storage. As others have said, the fabric is thin, but so far hasn’t torn. It isn’t the best value for your money I’d say since it’s $10 for just one small tunnel, but overall I think it’s worth it for how much fun our bunnies have playing in it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne brandt

customer_reviews.title: Havanese pup loves!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our puppy and starting from Week 8 he loved it. He did chew off one of the balls from the string so be mindful to avoid choking. He still plays with it although soon he’ll be too big to fit in it and I’ll need to upgrade. He was about 3.5 pounds when we got him and he’s now 6.5-7 and he still uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael McK

customer_reviews.title: My rabbits enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Good price and decent quality. My rabbits enjoy playing in it and its holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: I was only disappointed that it is somewhat narrower than expected and a ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat goes crazy in this tunnel he loves it! He especially loves the two toys attached, he will stalk them from the other side and run to get them, which gives him endless entertainment since he can never capture them when they bounce back. I was only disappointed that it is somewhat narrower than expected and a large cat might not fit. My cat is 12lbs though and so he fits in it well.
customer_reviews.author: DaveO

customer_reviews.title: Bunny loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dwarf bunny loves running around inside it & peeking out of the hole at the top! The only reason I took off a star is that it's not very sturdy. The plastic quite thin & it has no strings for me to tie it down & secure it, so it tends to roll around a lot when he's playing.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! The puppies are getting use to going through the tunnel. Even their momma is starting to go in it, but hasn't gone all the way through yet. Took off the toys at the end of the tunnel because the dogs weren't sure about them
customer_reviews.author: W. Whittenberger

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two rabbits, they are about the size of a cat. They love this! They both run through it about 30 times a day each because it is so fun for them! I even sometimes hide treats and toys in it! They love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Our kittens love this
customer_reviews.text: Two 3-month old kittens are loving this. It's perfect small size, easily collapsed and stored. They enjoy the hanging toys and the hole in the middle. Feather light such that they end up moving it from one room to another merely by doing a run and slide into it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebel

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice toy for pets. For $10 it could have been better but not bad. I would recommend it over other items that of similar price.
customer_reviews.author: Shilpa B.

customer_reviews.title: OH BOY!!!! Cats love it!!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. 2cats run through and.chase each other. Great for.ambushes.😺😺sturdy. Wires stay round. Turquoise is nice.
customer_reviews.author: delilah

customer_reviews.title: Everybody is happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: This play tunnel replaced another whose wires were poking all over. It is very light, but seems better constructed than the one we previously had. Our cat loves to play with it not only to hide, but as a slide on our hardwood floors. I just hope it will last more than the previous one.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Duenas

customer_reviews.title: Good budget item but watch for wear and only for a small pet
customer_reviews.text: Great for small dog , carefull as the wire on the ends will cut through the material and must be bent to keep your dog safe
customer_reviews.author: scott routledge

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when washing
customer_reviews.text: Make sure if you wash it, that it is REALLY secure. Mine came undone in the wash and it tore massive holes on the wire framing. I can still use it, just have to be cautious when opening and closing it so the wire doesnt poke out
customer_reviews.author: Bomb Ass Bitch Alex

customer_reviews.title: Too small for chihuahuas
customer_reviews.text: It would’ve been perfect except the size. I have two 7lb chihuahuas and it’s just a little too small for them.
customer_reviews.author: BMsilo

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was larger but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Tunnel appeared larger than it is in reality. My dog barely fits through it.
customer_reviews.author: LMowad

customer_reviews.title: Kitty playground.
customer_reviews.text: I love using this with my cat. I throw his favorite chew toy inside and he goes bizzerck running in and out of it. It's hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice for small breed animals
customer_reviews.text: More for kittens or small puppies, not golden retriever puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable for puppies
customer_reviews.text: My puppies only used it a couple of weeks when I noticed the metal coil, around the outside that holds its shape, sticking out. The fabric over it rubbed. Thankful it didn’t take out someone’s eye. Durability isn’t good for a puppy. Might be fine for a kitten or rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Taylor

customer_reviews.title: For really small pets
customer_reviews.text: My 11 lb dog is too big to crewal through it.
customer_reviews.author: sewall29

customer_reviews.title: Our bunnies love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this first for our bunnies. They love it! We tuck it in another for an extra long tube. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A Bienvenue

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Read description before but we thought it was larger . It’s very small
customer_reviews.author: Mike Merda

customer_reviews.title: Fun for your pets
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these --- some had 3 entrances, I stitched them all together and watched my small dog and kitty go wild chasing one another. These are great fun.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My cat loves it! She especially loves the little jingly toys that hang off the entrance -she has tons of fun running through the tunnel!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Playtime for hours
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my Chihuahua puppy. He plays for hours doing the zoomies through the house and of course the tunnel. It’s light, easily compacts for travel. Holds toys and his attention for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cat fun
customer_reviews.text: I added this tunnel to other ones I have. The cats like the distance. The foldable one I have is fun for them, but this firm tunnel is a different experience.
customer_reviews.author: Zenmoments Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: She loves it! her favorite toy. The wire at the end popped out but it wasn't too hard to put it back in.
customer_reviews.author: A.Keshavarz

customer_reviews.title: great (cheap) entertainment for a hyper puppy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for 2 hours and my puppy is obsessed... great (cheap) entertainment for a hyper puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Joshua C. Brasher

customer_reviews.title: It is definately durable-it's been put to the test
customer_reviews.text: We have two new kittens and they love it. They are about 4 months old so they're not really little. They will jump on the tunnel and it will bounce right back to its original shape. They also roll in the tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Refurbished = Junk

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, it's so cute to watch my four and seven year old kitties play w this! Well made and entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: My pets love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my pet rabbits and they absolutely love it. I plan to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made more for cats than dogs. The opening is more narrow than the tunnel itaself.
customer_reviews.author: FV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My kitten love it. Hours of play. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robin D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it. Can find from 1-4cats using it at any time.
customer_reviews.author: Sassycat888

customer_reviews.title: great product, my two cats went crazy over it
customer_reviews.text: great product, my two cats went crazy over it! they did rip the toys off within the first 8 hours but i’m pretty that’s because my cats are insane lol
customer_reviews.author: mbc28

customer_reviews.title: Nice little puppy blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors, soft. A little small. Threaded edging may get clawed and chewed on, hopely not swallowed, so will keep an eye on that.
customer_reviews.author: andy sims

customer_reviews.title: Good for Cats
customer_reviews.text: It was way too small for my dog. I can it's good for cats and a Chihuahua type dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin Material
customer_reviews.text: I hoped my rabbit wouldnt be able to tear through but she dug through it easily
customer_reviews.author: Megan St Jean

customer_reviews.title: Fair price.
customer_reviews.text: My kittens loved it, is not bad for the price. Blue fabric is really thin but despite all it holds.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies loves this! It keeps them busy and active all day
customer_reviews.author: ting jay

customer_reviews.title: ONe of his favorite toys.
customer_reviews.text: Our bunny loves this tunnel. ONe of his favorite toys.
customer_reviews.author: L Photos

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ it !
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t real sure about this when I purchased it but was really happy to see that it is durable and it is colorful and my cats love it. It’s easy to wash off and it’s easy to pick up to get off the floor. I highly recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Massage - Touch Therapy

customer_reviews.title: Bunny likes it.
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves this tunnel. She sits in it all the time in her yard run. Unfortunately she likes to chew on it as well. Hope it holds up for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Kraut

product_meta.title: Juvale Pack of 1 Pet Agility Play Tunnel Tube Accessory Gift - Pet Training Toy for Small Pets, Dogs, Cats, Rabbits, Teal - 47 x 9.75 inches
product_meta.description: Give your pet endless hours of fun with this Play Tunnel with soft ball toy and small ring rattle ball. Toys like this can help to improve pet agility and dexterity, as well as providing a healthy form of exercise. The rugged built-in steel frame helps maintain the tunnel's shape and the polyester tube is tear-resistant and safe for lengthy use. Dimensions: 47 inches long; 9.75 inches in height
feature_bullets: FUN: The lengthy, Bright Blue tunnel-style design makes this toy tube ideal for small pets like cats, rabbits or small dogs and puppies to experience their own tunnel fun and exercise.
STURDY: The rugged built-in steel frame helps maintain the tunnel's shape and the polyester tube is tear-resistant and safe for lengthy use
SIMPLE: Easily collapsible form helps keep possible space occupied to a minimum, and allows for easy pick up whenever necessary.
RATTLES: A soft ball toy and a small ring rattle ball hung on the exit provide entertainment for your pet, for example, when you're not at home
DIMENSIONS: 47 inches long; 9.75 inches in height. Includes 3 openings.
